mapper.select: SELECT concat(group_id, '|', param_id) AS pk_id, group_id, param_id, param_value, param_name, remark FROM sys_param

SELECT concat(group_id, '|', dict_value) AS pk_id, group_id, CASE WHEN dict_value IS NOT NULL THEN concat(dict_value, '-', dict_name) ELSE dict_name END dict_name, dict_value, group_name FROM sys_dict
